document.full_text: croatia indicted a former senior interior ministry official on thursday, charging him with war crimes against serb civilians at the beginning of the country's independence war in the early 1990s.
document.title: croatia charges former official with war crimes
lines_and_colors: croatia indicted a former senior interior ministry official on thursday, charging him with war crimes against serb civilians at the beginning of the country's independence war in the early 1990s.
